title: Ticky - Event Manager
description: All-in-one platform to create, organize and manage your professional events with an exceptional user experience and cutting-edge tools.

title: GLCH community landing page
description: Showcase site of a community health association in the western region of Cameroon with monitoring and registration for community events.

title: TelePost
description: Blog with an integrated content manager for the publication of posts by each user, practical application of web development with Python.

title: GLCH card payement

title: Validix - JS
description: A fast, vanilla JS form validator designed for quick use in projects, eliminating the need for complex and often difficult-to-implement frameworks.
